subject: Character Demo - "Baizhu: Curing the Root Cause" | Genshin Impact
content:
A physician's prescription must adapt to all facets of an individual's circumstances.

To protect life most precious, one must first be able to identify truth, falsehood, and signs.
contentOriginal:
A physician's prescription must adapt to all facets of an individual's circumstances.

To protect life most precious, one must first be able to identify truth, falsehood, and signs.

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Baizhu: Opportune Remedies" | Genshin Impact
content:
It is impossible to operate a successful pharmacy in Liyue Harbor on the strength of one's medical skills alone.

Baizhu has a knack for knowing when to treat patients without asking for any compensation, and when the circumstances demand an appropriate markup.
contentOriginal:
It is impossible to operate a successful pharmacy in Liyue Harbor on the strength of one's medical skills alone.

Baizhu has a knack for knowing when to treat patients without asking for any compensation, and when the circumstances demand an appropriate markup.

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Kaveh: Idealistic Ambition" | Genshin Impact
content:
From smooth sailing to being tempest-tossed by fate, the young architect has experienced much.

Does one's character determine their destiny... or can their next step be a turning point?
contentOriginal:
From smooth sailing to being tempest-tossed by fate, the young architect has experienced much.

Does one's character determine their destiny... or can their next step be a turning point?

subject: Story Teaser: Changsheng | Genshin Impact
content:
Misfortune and disease, the unavoidable suffering of humanity.

Death and immortality, the inscrutable enigmas of this world.
contentOriginal:
Misfortune and disease, the unavoidable suffering of humanity.

Death and immortality, the inscrutable enigmas of this world.

At the end of this contest, the victor shall have the answers.

subject: "The Recollector's Path" Event: Trials of the Bloomguard
content:
〓Event Duration〓

2023/05/08 10:00:00 – 2023/05/22 03:59:59


〓Event Rewards〓



〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above

And complete the World Quest "The Splendorous Sky That Day"

※ Obtain the "Twin-Horned Chaplet" in the World Quest "As the Khvarena's Light Shows" first to get the best experience from this event.

※ During the event, if you have not obtained the "Twin-Horned Chaplet" in the World Quest "As the Khvarena's Light Shows," you can enter the event through "Quick Start" in the event page.


〓Event Details〓

● On the first 6 days of the "The Recollector's Path" event, a corresponding quest will be unlocked alongside two trials daily, and all prior quests and trials must be completed before the content of the following day can be accepted.

● Trials need to be completed by Sorush alone and they come in three varieties:

Tranquil Trail: Use the power of Nirodha Fruits to activate Curios and repel the uninvited guests invading the Vourukasha Oasis.

Intrepid Impulse: Sorush must reach her destination within the time limit.

Reinforced Reminiscence: Discover sites of important memories and restore a scene of significance.

subject: "The Recollector's Path" Event Tips
content: A noble character of stalwart virtue is indispensable when faced with the totality of challenges. Therefore, the Traveler must assist Sorush in a series of trials to fully understand her responsibilities...

subject: Version 3.7 Special Program Preview
content:
Dear Travelers,

It's announcement time! The special program for Genshin Impact's new version will premiere on the official Twitch channel on 5/13/2023 at 08:00 AM (UTC-4)!


>>> https://www.twitch.tv/genshinimpactofficial/schedule <<<


This special program will feature juicy details about new game content and developments in Version 3.7. It will also "drop" some redemption codes and other goodies!


The special program will also be broadcast on the official YouTube channel on 5/13/2023 at 09:00 AM (UTC-4)


>>> https://www.youtube.com/@GenshinImpact <<<


Make sure to follow us, Travelers. We'll see you there!

subject: "Overflowing Mastery" Event: Double Drops With Talent Level-Up Materials
content:
During the event, successfully challenge Talent Level-Up Material Domains and consume "Original Resin" to double your rewards.


〓Event Duration〓

2023/05/15 04:00:00 – 2023/05/22 03:59:59


〓Eligibility〓

After activating corresponding Talent Level-Up Material Domains


〓Event Details〓

● During the "Overflowing Mastery" event, successfully challenge Talent Level-Up Material Domains such as "Forsaken Rift," "Taishan Mansion," "Violet Court," and "Steeple of Ignorance" and consume "Original Resin" to double your rewards. You can double your rewards up to 3 times a day!

During the event, successfully challenge Talent Level-Up Material Domains and consume "Original Resin" to double your rewards.


〓Event Duration〓

2023/05/15 04:00:00 – 2023/05/22 03:59:59


〓Eligibility〓

After activating corresponding Talent Level-Up Material Domains


〓Event Details〓

● During the "Overflowing Mastery" event, successfully challenge Talent Level-Up Material Domains such as "Forsaken Rift," "Taishan Mansion," "Violet Court," and "Steeple of Ignorance" and consume "Original Resin" to double your rewards. You can double your rewards up to 3 times a day!

subject: Version 3.7 "Duel! The Summoners' Summit!" Trailer | Genshin Impact
content:
A game of cards is much like life: Fortune decides the hand you are dealt, while experience might let you shift the tides of possibility toward all that could be.

Life is much like a game of cards: Victory is but the culminating point in the journey — the thrills of the duel, however, represent strings to melodies everlasting.

A game of cards is much like life: Fortune decides the hand you are dealt, while experience might let you shift the tides of possibility toward all that could be.

Life is much like a game of cards: Victory is but the culminating point in the journey — the thrills of the duel, however, represent strings to melodies everlasting.

subject: The Content Display Page for new Genius Invokation TCG content in Version 3.7, "Kings and Queens of Invokations, Assemble!", is now available!
content:
Hi Travelers, the King of Invokations Grand Prix is about to begin! Go to the Content Display Page "Kings and Queens of Invokations, Assemble!" to see the new Character Cards and Action Cards as well as the new TCG gameplay modes!


>> Click here to view the "Kings and Queens of Invokations, Assemble!" Content Display Page <<


Finish browsing through the Content Display Page to receive Mora ×20,000!

*The reward can be claimed any time before the end of Version 3.7.

*Once claimed, the reward will be sent to you via in-game mail within 5-10 minutes.
contentOriginal:
Hi Travelers, the King of Invokations Grand Prix is about to begin! Go to the Content Display Page "Kings and Queens of Invokations, Assemble!" to see the new Character Cards and Action Cards as well as the new TCG gameplay modes!

subject: Character Demo - "Kirara: Twin-Tailed Courier" | Genshin Impact
content:
Up hill and dale, by the light of the stars and moon, the soft patter of Kirara's paws never ceases. The stunning scenery she passes and the smiles of her customers are what she truly treasures in her work.

Of course, if there's any trouble on the way, it's best to just take care of it. After all, cats need to keep their claws sharp.
contentOriginal:
Up hill and dale, by the light of the stars and moon, the soft patter of Kirara's paws never ceases. The stunning scenery she passes and the smiles of her customers are what she truly treasures in her work.

Of course, if there's any trouble on the way, it's best to just take care of it. After all, cats need to keep their claws sharp.

subject: "Sign here please~ Meow!"
content:
Hello, Travelers~ Today, we will be introducing a new character, Kirara!

She is a courier for Komaniya Express, a delivery company in Inazuma, and a nekomata who loves her job and human society.

subject: "Duel! The Summoners' Summit!" Event: Take Part and Obtain the Event-Exclusive Weapon, Ibis Piercer (Bow)
content:
〓Event Gameplay Duration〓

2023/05/25 10:00:00 - 2023/06/12 03:59:59


〓Event Rewards〓


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 32 or above

Complete the Archon Quest "Ritou Escape Plan"

And complete the World Quest "Battlefield of Dice, Cats, and Cards"

※ Complete the Archon Quest "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises," Mona's Story Quest "Astrolabos Chapter: Act I," and Raiden Shogun's Story Quest "Imperatrix Umbrosa Chapter: Act II" first to get the best experience from this event.

※ During the event, if you have not completed the Archon Quest "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises," Mona's Story Quest "Astrolabos Chapter: Act I," and Raiden Shogun's Story Quest "Imperatrix Umbrosa Chapter: Act II," you can enter the event through "Quick Start" in the event page.


〓Event Phase Details〓


〓Event Details〓

● During the event, four types of gameplay will unlock in sequence: A Tour of Wonders, Zero Hour Invokation, Evermotion Mechanical Painting: Invoker, and Heart of the Dice.

● In the "A Tour of Wonders" gameplay, Travelers will have to complete the required challenges and find the Scenic Checkpoints for stamps.

● In the "Zero Hour Invokation" gameplay, Travelers will have to use preset decks to engage in Genius Invokation duels.

● In the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting: Invoker" gameplay, Travelers will have to restore 8 Evermotion Mechanical Paintings and assemble the paintings.

● In the "Heart of the Dice" gameplay, Travelers can defeat enemies to accumulate Invokation Dice. Consume Invokation Dice gained to cast Suppressive Rolls, which will allow the Traveler to more efficiently contain their foes and obtain numerous benefits.

● Complete these phases to obtain Invokation Coupons to exchange for rewards such as Ibis Piercer, Crown of Insight, and the event-exclusive Weapon Refinement Materials from the Event Shop.

● After the event gameplay period ends, Invokation Coupons will disappear. Please make sure to claim the rewards in time.
contentOriginal:
〓Event Gameplay Duration〓

2023/05/25 10:00:00 - 2023/06/12 03:59:59

〓Event Phase Details〓

● In the "Heart of the Dice" gameplay, Travelers can defeat enemies to accumulate Invokation Dice. Consume Invokation Dice gained to cast Suppressive Rolls, which will allow the Traveler to more efficiently contain their foes and obtain numerous benefits.

● Complete these phases to obtain Invokation Coupons to exchange for rewards such as Ibis Piercer, Crown of Insight, and the event-exclusive Weapon Refinement Materials from the Event Shop.

● After the event gameplay period ends, Invokation Coupons will disappear. Please make sure to claim the rewards in time.

subject: "Genius Invokation TCG" Event: The Forge Realm's Temper
content:
〓Event Duration〓 

Available throughout the entirety of Version 3.7

 

〓Event Rewards〓


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 32 or above

Complete Archon Quest Prologue: Act III "Song of the Dragon and Freedom"

And complete the World Quest "Battlefield of Dice, Cats, and Cards"

 

〓Event Details〓

● After the event starts, Travelers can go to Prince at The Cat's Tail to select stages to challenge.

● This event includes 5 stages and each stage has its distinctive challenge rules.

● In each stage, Travelers can configure different parameters, including stage difficulty, the health of opponents, and the number of rounds to complete the challenge within.

● After completing the challenge, points will be obtained based on the parameters selected. Achieving the required scores will allow Travelers to claim the corresponding rewards.
contentOriginal:

And complete the World Quest "Battlefield of Dice, Cats, and Cards"

 

〓Event Details〓

● After the event starts, Travelers can go to Prince at The Cat's Tail to select stages to challenge.

● This event includes 5 stages and each stage has its distinctive challenge rules.

● In each stage, Travelers can configure different parameters, including stage difficulty, the health of opponents, and the number of rounds to complete the challenge within.

● After completing the challenge, points will be obtained based on the parameters selected. Achieving the required scores will allow Travelers to claim the corresponding rewards.

subject: "Carassius Auratus Chapter: Act II" Story Quest Overview
content:
"Carassius Auratus Chapter: Act II" Story Quest Overview


Travelers who reach the required Adventure Rank and complete the prerequisite quests will be able to use a Story Key to unlock Yoimiya's Story Quest "Carassius Auratus Chapter: Act II."

The Story Quest feature is unlocked at Adventure Rank 26. Story Keys are obtained by completing Daily Commissions (one Story Key is awarded for every eight commissions completed.)


〓Quest Start Time〓

Permanently available after the Version 3.7 update


〓Quest Unlock Criteria〓

Adventure Rank 40 or above

Complete Archon Quest Chapter III: Act V "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises"

Complete Raiden Shogun's Story Quest - Imperatrix Umbrosa Chapter: Act II "Transient Dreams"

And complete the World Quest "The World of Aranara" from Aranyaka: Part II "Dream Nursery"
contentOriginal:
"Carassius Auratus Chapter: Act II" Story Quest Overview


Travelers who reach the required Adventure Rank and complete the prerequisite quests will be able to use a Story Key to unlock Yoimiya's Story Quest "Carassius Auratus Chapter: Act II."

The Story Quest feature is unlocked at Adventure Rank 26. Story Keys are obtained by completing Daily Commissions (one Story Key is awarded for every eight commissions completed.)


〓Quest Start Time〓

Permanently available after the Version 3.7 update


〓Quest Unlock Criteria〓

Adventure Rank 40 or above

Complete Archon Quest Chapter III: Act V "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises"

Complete Raiden Shogun's Story Quest - Imperatrix Umbrosa Chapter: Act II "Transient Dreams"

And complete the World Quest "The World of Aranara" from Aranyaka: Part II "Dream Nursery"

subject: "Hangout Events: Series X" - Story Quest Overview
content:
Travelers who reach the required Adventure Rank and complete the prerequisite quests will be able to use a Story Key to unlock the Hangout Event for Kaveh.

The Hangout Events feature is unlocked at Adventure Rank 26. Story Keys are obtained by completing Daily Commissions (one Story Key is awarded for every eight commissions completed.)


〓Quest Start Time〓

Permanently available after the Version 3.7 update


〓Series X Unlock Criteria〓

Hangout Event: Kaveh - Act I

Adventure Rank 40 or above

Complete Archon Quest Chapter III: Act V "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises"

And complete Alhaitham's Story Quest - Vultur Volans Chapter: Act I "The Illusions of the Mob"

subject: Version 3.7 Event Wishes Notice - Phase I
content:
Event Wish "Tapestry of Golden Flames" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya (Pyro)!


Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!


〓Event Wish Duration〓

After the Version 3.7 update—2023/6/13 17:59


〓Event Wish Details〓

● During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya (Pyro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Cat Upon the Eaves" Kirara (Dendro), "Stage Lucida" Yun Jin (Geo), and "Frozen Ardor" Chongyun (Cryo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● After this event wish ends, the 4-star character "Cat Upon the Eaves" Kirara (Dendro) will be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation" in the next Version.


※ Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

※ This is for "Character Event Wish." The wish guarantee count for "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2" is shared, and is accumulated between both "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2." This wish guarantee count is independent of the guarantee counts of other types of wishes.

※ The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.


Event Wish "Everbloom Violet" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Astute Amusement" Yae Miko (Electro)!


Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!


〓Event Wish Duration〓

After the Version 3.7 update—2023/6/13 17:59


〓Event Wish Details〓

● During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Astute Amusement" Yae Miko (Electro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Cat Upon the Eaves" Kirara (Dendro), "Stage Lucida" Yun Jin (Geo), and "Frozen Ardor" Chongyun (Cryo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● After this event wish ends, the 4-star character "Cat Upon the Eaves" Kirara (Dendro) will be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation" in the next Version.


※ Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

※ This is for "Character Event Wish-2." The wish guarantee count for "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2" is shared, and is accumulated between both "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2." This wish guarantee count is independent of the guarantee counts of other types of wishes.

※ The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.


Event Wish "Epitome Invocation" - Boosted Drop Rates for Thundering Pulse (Bow) and Kagura's Verity (Catalyst)!


Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in "Epitome Invocation" to make your party stronger in combat!


〓Event Wish Duration〓

After the Version 3.7 update—2023/6/13 17:59


〓Event Wish Details〓

● During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapons Thundering Pulse (Bow) and Kagura's Verity (Catalyst) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During this event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapon Akuoumaru (Claymore) and 4-star weapons The Flute (Sword), Dragon's Bane (Polearm), The Widsith (Catalyst), and Rust (Bow) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During this event wish, use Epitomized Path to chart a course towards a promotional 5-star weapon, such as Thundering Pulse (Bow) or Kagura's Verity (Catalyst). For more information on Epitomized Path, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

※ Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

 

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

This wish guarantee count is independent of the guarantee counts of other types of wishes.

※ The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.


Event Wish "Everbloom Violet" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Astute Amusement" Yae Miko (Electro)!


Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!


〓Event Wish Duration〓

After the Version 3.7 update—2023/6/13 17:59


〓Event Wish Details〓

● During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Astute Amusement" Yae Miko (Electro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Cat Upon the Eaves" Kirara (Dendro), "Stage Lucida" Yun Jin (Geo), and "Frozen Ardor" Chongyun (Cryo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● After this event wish ends, the 4-star character "Cat Upon the Eaves" Kirara (Dendro) will be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation" in the next Version.


※ Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

※ This is for "Character Event Wish-2." The wish guarantee count for "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2" is shared, and is accumulated between both "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2." This wish guarantee count is independent of the guarantee counts of other types of wishes.

※ The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.


Event Wish "Epitome Invocation" - Boosted Drop Rates for Thundering Pulse (Bow) and Kagura's Verity (Catalyst)!


Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in "Epitome Invocation" to make your party stronger in combat!


〓Event Wish Duration〓

After the Version 3.7 update—2023/6/13 17:59


〓Event Wish Details〓

● During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapons Thundering Pulse (Bow) and Kagura's Verity (Catalyst) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During this event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapon Akuoumaru (Claymore) and 4-star weapons The Flute (Sword), Dragon's Bane (Polearm), The Widsith (Catalyst), and Rust (Bow) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During this event wish, use Epitomized Path to chart a course towards a promotional 5-star weapon, such as Thundering Pulse (Bow) or Kagura's Verity (Catalyst). For more information on Epitomized Path, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

※ Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

 

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

subject: Genshin Impact Version 3.7 Community Events Overview （Constantly Updated）
content:
Greetings, Travelers!


Genshin Impact Version 3.7 is here! Mimo has brought you the latest Genshin Impact event news from HoYoLAB. Come have a look~


Check out all the latest community reward events in the "Official" > "Events" page!



Ended




▌Event: Hilichurls' Treasure Trove


Event Duration: 05/24 – 07/02 23:59 (UTC+8)

Event Rewards: Primogems and other rewards!

How to Participate: Complete event missions to obtain points. Use the points to draw for Primogems and other rewards!




▌Event: Forum Event for Yae Miko's Birthday


Event Duration: 06/27 – 06/29 23:59 (UTC+8)

Event Rewards: Genshin Impact Merchandise

How to Participate: Post birthday wishes for Yae Miko or share the event post to win merchandise rewards~




▌Event: Rewards Event: Share "Divine Ingenuity: Collector's Chapter" Custom Domain to Win Primogems!


Event Duration: 06/08 – 06/29 23:59 (UTC+8)

Event Rewards: Primogems and other rewards!

How to Participate: Share your Custom Domains for a chance to win Primogems!




▌Event: "Co-Op Mode" Topic Event


Event Duration: 06/16 – 06/29 23:59 (UTC+8)

Event Rewards: Primogems

How to Participate: Share your Co-Op stories for a chance to win Primogems!




▌Event: Forum Event for Raiden Shogun's Birthday


Event Duration: 06/26 – 06/28 23:59 (UTC+8)

Event Rewards: Genshin Impact Merchandise

How to Participate: Post birthday wishes for Raiden Shogun or share the event post to win merchandise rewards~




▌Event: "Feast of the Departed Warriors" Score Sharing Event

Event Rewards: Primogems

How to Participate: Share your scores in the "Feast of the Departed Warriors" event for a chance to win Primogems!






Check out all the latest community reward events in the "Official" > "Events" page!

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Kirara: Meow-mentous Speed" | Genshin Impact
content:
The beautiful scenery passing by, the smell of delicious nekomanma, a cardboard box by the road...

"No no no, no getting distracted. I gotta get this package delivered first!"
contentOriginal:
The beautiful scenery passing by, the smell of delicious nekomanma, a cardboard box by the road...

"No no no, no getting distracted. I gotta get this package delivered first!"

subject: Cutscene Animation: "A Wish Upon Shooting Stars" | Genshin Impact
content:
A child's dreams are simple and pure. As she lays eyes on the meteor-streaked firmament, the sky slumbering in midnight reverie will scintillate for her.

But dreams, be they simple or profound, realistic or fantastical, possess a power that cannot be denied.

For this power is like fireworks ablaze, rising with a force that elevates them to stride amongst the stars.
contentOriginal:
A child's dreams are simple and pure. As she lays eyes on the meteor-streaked firmament, the sky slumbering in midnight reverie will scintillate for her.

But dreams, be they simple or profound, realistic or fantastical, possess a power that cannot be denied.

For this power is like fireworks ablaze, rising with a force that elevates them to stride amongst the stars.
